title: How has life changed over the past 500 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on where you live. If you live with an undiscovered tribe in the Amazon jungles, then life is just the same now as it was 500 years ago. You are still a hunter gatherer. If you live in the USA, you have gone from the agrarian age to the space age during that same time period. Our minds and bodies still have not caught up withthe changes.

Sterilization of medical equipment, innovation in immunological, agricultural seeds, farming, dentistry, pain suppressants, surgical techniques, organ transplants, cloning, recovery of discarded or hard to get materials in mining, new food sources, all manner of communicating ideas, business & news, preservation/refridgeration/processing of food and it’s world wide distribution, new energy and techniques coming online as well as grey & potable water distribution & use, transportation.
